plugins.name: ralph
plugins.description: Autonomous AI coding loop that ships features while you sleep. Ralph picks stories from a PRD, implements them, runs checks, commits, and repeats until done.

plugins.name: ralph-loop
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development, implementing the Ralph Wiggum technique. Run Claude in a while-true loop with the same prompt until task completion.

plugins.name: campaign-agents
plugins.description: Hierarchical agent system for long-running autonomous coding campaigns. Uses Claude Opus 4.5 for planning and pk-puzldai/droid with minimax-m2.1 and GLM-4.7 for task execution.
